text: Estrella Zeledón Lizano (April 21, 1929 – April 10, 2019) was a Costa Rican politician. She was the First Lady of Costa Rica from 1978 to 1982 during the presidency of her husband, Rodrigo Carazo Odio. She also served on the Executive Council of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) from 1981 until 1985. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Costa Rica
title: Estrella Zeledón Lizano
